session_info.name: MOXAP - Plenary Invited Oral Presentation, Colliders

papers.title: Review of the Possible Projects towards a Higgs Factory
authors: several accelerator technologies from linear to circular colliders using various kinds of particles from leptons (electron

muons) or gammas or hadrons in LHC. The speaker should review the varios proposals outlining the pros&cons of each technology as well as the corresponding challenges and issues to be addressed by specific R&D before a proposal can be realistically be proposed. The talk should also dicsuss Snowmass-2013 recommendations.
